name: Slide Puzzle: Cute Moe Girls
description:
A puzzle game with lots of cute girls!
「Slide Puzzle: Cute Moe Girls」

This is a slide style puzzle game.
Complete the illustrated puzzles of cute girls to open up the gallery!

There are 20 different stages.
After solving a puzzle, you can view it in the gallery page.

Come and play!

* Please note that the rating is set due to the presence of revealing images, but does not include images of sexual acts.
